channel.title: [WDOTM] MITB Homepage (Completed)
channel.description:
Ok guys, as [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,212246.msg1858564.html#msg1858564]Mitb suggested in this topic[/url], we're having a contest where we create a brand new moparisthebest.com homepage.
Right now are the 'preliminaries.' As per his request, there will be teams of two allowed. If you already decided on a partner, post his/her username here, as well as the URI of the page in progress (pure competition allows for the best outcomes). If you need web space/hosting, PM me or talk to me on MSN/AIM and I'll hook you up. I'll keep a running list of teams. Also, if you're good at backend scripting, and you need a designer, or vice versa, post your field of expertise here. I'll also keep a running list of people who need partners, so you can find matches easily.
This preliminary stage will last for [s]two days[/s] one week, until November 9nd, 2007, 5:00PM EDT. At that time, no new people can join. The actual competition will last until December 2th, 2007, 5:00PM EDT. Added more time, since I extended the competition deadline.
As for what you need to create... a homepage for MITB. It can be car themed, but get creative. Possibly a site and a cms.
Everyone's work will be in the public domain in progress. I'm assuming no one will blatantly copy off each other, because that's simply stupid. Offer comments, suggestions, and criticisms, guys. When you create an admin center (for posting news and other administrative tasks), I suggest you give public access to the administrator account, so people can exploit it for possible bugs. Make sure nothing can be permanently deleted without accessing the MySQL database directly, so if someone [i]does[/i] get control of an admin account, no harm can come to it.
Update: Now the preliminary round is over, and the teams are SET. I know it may have caused some confusion, but it was all for the better. I did it this way so teams don't start switching up a few days before the event is over, and then there is the chaos of how to split the work that's been done already and who gets what and it's just a mess. Anyway, let me know if there are last minute stragglers and if there is any incorrect information below. Also, another requirement: Make a little write-up in the "About" section of your website (alternately, you could put this in a word document or pdf file if you are so inclined). Explain all the nifty features of your site, the efficiencies, the cool MySQL querying method you used, whatever. Also, as for who decides which is the best, Moparisthebest will either be the judge, or he will delegate some people (or all people) to be judges.
[b]Teams:[/b] xxlegitxx, exception - http://sneamia.net/junk/mitbhomepage/ MastrChief, 3.65 Kilos - http://www.chatshack.us/mitb/ [s]R.I.P RSC - http://mitb.freehostia.com/[/s] Vortex - http://jamili.da3rx.com/page/ Bang Train, Kloplop321 - http://mitb.kloplop321.com/ sppt, RXVL - http://s194501339.onlinehome.us/mopar2.0/ ThAt0n36Uy, J# Tbh - http://mitb.ppsoft.adams-host.com/ Kimber - http://www.ownaclub.com/mitb OnlyOneRule - http://onlyonerule.pwnds.info/mitb/ alexia - http://randomofftopic.com/moparsite/ FastBawlz, .Flair - http://freewebs.com/mitbcunt/ d_sign - http://phpindev.ulmb.com/mitb/ S!ms - http://weejewel.pwnds.info/ Unid H4x0r, Tobias222 - http://007pkerz.com/mitb/ welshy - http://www.welshys-world.pwnds.info/mopar/ Clear - http://www.runeore.org/mitb/ ThatOneServer - http://thatoneserver.no-ip.org/mitb/

item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:432, topic:155963”]I haven’t been on in a while, but I guess I won it

Looking at all of the entries yours is by far the best design. It looked awesome and I would like to use it as the home page for moparisthebest.com, so would you mind zipping everything I need up and sending it to me when you get a chance? Thanks alot, When I go to announce the winner I’ll work out an award to give you

Too bad I deleted it around a year ago :P[/quote]Fuckin’ owned.

Read full topic

item.title: [WDOTM] MITB Homepage (Completed)
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:419, topic:155963”][quote author=Bang Train link=topic=212824.msg1914696#msg1914696 date=1196841625]
edit: Mopar is in college right?
Probably taking exams or studying for them
[/quote]

Bang Train got it.

Sorry about that guys, as a warning for the rest of you, don’t wait until the last minute to do a semester long group project, because your group might completely screw you over like mine did. It was due monday, and they sent me thier code monday at 1am, and what they did was about 10% complete. So I didn’t sleep the next two nights so I could turn it in Wednesday, and then worked on it the next few days to work out all the bugs by friday (test day). During the course of my group attempting to help me, they admitted they did not know how to use an ArrayList, they couldn’t figure out how to make javadocs, they duplicated variables in a child class because apparantly they didn’t understand the concept of inheritence, it was a nightmare I tell you. And now exams are next week, but then I’m free

xxlegitxx did what I would have done anyway, put up a poll.[/quote]
I was thinking about like a semester exam, as ours are comming up, and the end of the year is comming up.

Read full topic

item.title: [WDOTM] MITB Homepage (Completed)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Bang Train, post:405, topic:155963”]edit: Mopar is in college right?
Probably taking exams or studying for them[/quote]

Bang Train got it.

Sorry about that guys, as a warning for the rest of you, don’t wait until the last minute to do a semester long group project, because your group might completely screw you over like mine did. It was due monday, and they sent me thier code monday at 1am, and what they did was about 10% complete. So I didn’t sleep the next two nights so I could turn it in Wednesday, and then worked on it the next few days to work out all the bugs by friday (test day). During the course of my group attempting to help me, they admitted they did not know how to use an ArrayList, they couldn’t figure out how to make javadocs, they duplicated variables in a child class because apparantly they didn’t understand the concept of inheritence, it was a nightmare I tell you. And now exams are next week, but then I’m free

xxlegitxx did what I would have done anyway, put up a poll.

Read full topic
